channel.title: [508] Drop Help
channel.description:
I first realized this when my friend came on a server I am making. I was killing the monsters but he was getting the drop. Even when he was nowhere near me. It printed this on run.bat.
[code] Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 [/code]
Tell me what's wrong and how to fix it please.

item.title: [508] Drop Help
